title.rendered: TOP 7 BEST GIFT IDEAS FOR MEN

content.rendered:
TOP 7 BEST GIFT IDEAS FOR MEN

It’s time to celebrate the special men in our lives with the top 7 best gift ideas for men blog edit.

Click on the product names to shop. Starting off with the super popular Replica fragrance for men that smells like cocktails and cigars.

Luxury fitness club Equinox has Kiehl’s cream in every locker room. It’s that good! It’s also one of the top creams that men love since it has a very mild non-fragrance scent. It also has tons of 5 start ratings online. Love this cream!

Most men love electronics and Google voice-activated speaker is the absolute perfect gift for both men and women. It’s currently on sale at Nordstrom.com for $99.

The Herschel Supply Co. camo bag has hundreds of 5-star ratings and it does not hurt that it looks cool. I even want one!

You also can never go wrong with getting essential gifts like the ever popular Ray-Ban sunglasses and the Champion sweatshirts that start at $30-$45. 

Polish your look or spoil the man in your life with this unique Alexander Mcqueen cool skull bracelet.

You can also give D’Lashes lash extensions gift card for men. Yes, men love lash extensions too! D’Lashes offers natural look options that are customized to each client needs. Buy Gift Card here. These are my top 7 gifts for men. I hope you love them as much as I do. Happy Father’s Day!

LOVE DIONNE
